DOC.brief_summary: The broad aim determine efficacy weight loss diet high protein lower carbohydrate combine low intensity exercise favorably impact body composition , bone health , physical function , metabolic disease quality life compare conventional high carbohydrate diet overweight woman age 60 .
DOC.brief_title: Higher Protein Diet Exercise Optimal Weight Loss Elderly Women
